sentences.sContent: He used color fearlessly--they were part of his stories, and an integral part of models' makeup, which was often key in completing the worlds McQueen envisioned.
sentences.sContent_eng: He used color fearlessly--they were part of his stories, and an integral part of models' makeup, which was often key in completing the worlds McQueen envisioned.
sentences.sCn: 他大胆地用着用着色彩——这是他的故事的组成部分，也是模特不可分割的组成部分，而这常是麦昆预想的世界的关键组成部分。
